data.title: Maxim Crane Works Releases Third Quarter Financial Results, Announces Entrance into Amended and Rest
data.meta_description: Maxim Crane Works Releases Third Quarter Financial Results, Announces Entrance into Amended and Restated Senior Secured Syndicated Credit Facility and Schedules Bond Investor Call for November 20, 2012   PITTSBURGH--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Maxim
data.text:
Maxim Crane Works Releases Third Quarter Financial Results, Announces Entrance into Amended and Restated Senior Secured Syndicated Credit Facility and Schedules Bond Investor Call for November 20, 2012

PITTSBURGH--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Maxim Crane Works Holdings, Inc. today announced that it will host a bond investor call on Tuesday, November 20, 2012 at 10:00 a.m. Eastern Time on its third quarter 2012 financial results. The financial results have been posted to the Company's website and have been filed with the Trustee. In addition, on November 6, 2012, the Company entered into an amended and restated senior secured syndicated credit facility. The Company filed the agreement with the Trustee and posted it on investor website in accordance with the indenture agreement.

Maxim Crane Works does not make its financial information available to the public. Access to the call is restricted to holders of the Senior Secured Notes issued by Maxim Crane Works, L.P. and Maxim Finance Corporation, qualified prospective investors in the Notes and certain securities analysts. Details on how to access the call, as well as financial statements posted on Maxim Crane's secure investor website, can be obtained by certified users via the "Bond Investors" page of the Company's public website at http://www.maximcrane.com/investor-relations/index.html.

If you are a holder, qualified prospective investor or securities analyst who would like to access our secure website but have not yet been certified by Maxim Crane, please see the "Bond Investors" page of our public website at the URL above for information on how to become certified.

About Maxim Crane Works

Maxim Crane Works, the nation's leading coast-to-coast full-service crane rental and sales company, operates 30 branch offices throughout the United States. The Company specializes in the rental and sales of cranes, aerial work platforms, rough-terrain telescopic forklifts, boom trucks and other ancillary equipment. Each Maxim Crane office location has the capability and resources to provide management, rigging, engineering and outsourcing, making the Company's product and service offerings the most comprehensive in the industry. More information about Maxim Crane can be found on the Company's website at www.maximcrane.com.

Maxim Crane Works, L.P.

Ryan R. Gutwald, 412-504-0196

Legal Department Manager
